original_text:
Golden Ark
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 10
Puntata min.: 0,10 €
Puntata max.: 100 €
Autoplay: si
Tema e grafica
Il tema delle antiche civiltà scomparse trova ampio spazio nelle slot machine, in particolare, l’Antico Egitto non smette di esercitare il suo fascino anche tra gli appassionati di giochi online.
Con questa slot firmata Novomatic, vestiamo i panni di un’esploratrice alla ricerca degli antichi tesori del faraone, tra simboli esoterici e libri preziosi.
Il gioco si svolge all’interno di una cripta che si trova al di sotto di un’enorme piramide e lo scopo è quello di trovare il tesoro e scappare dalla tomba.
La grafica è senza dubbio molto accattivante e pur non offrendo particolari effetti speciali, accompagna piacevolmente l’esperienza di gioco.

Simboli, Wild e Scatter
I simboli riproducono in maniera accurata l’antica simbologia egizia: troviamo dei guerrieri di bronzo, un libro, l’immancabile occhio di Horus e altri oggetti dorati, oltre alle carte da gioco dal 9 all’asso, rappresentate con una grafica che mima i geroglifici.
Il simbolo Scatter in questa slot è il mitico Libro di Ra, con la copertina ricca di gioielli incastonati! Quando compare per almeno tre volte si sblocca l’accesso a ben dieci giri gratis.
Il Libro di Ra, inoltre, rappresenta anche il Wild, con funzione di jolly, che in una singola linea può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli.

Come si gioca a Golden Ark?
Per ottenere una vittoria su Golden Ark è necessario che i simboli compaiano nel giusto ordine in una linea di vincita, per almeno due volte e da sinistra verso destra.
La regola della posizione sul rullo non è valida per il simbolo Scatter, che paga in qualsiasi posizione.
Questo gioco prevede anche la possibilità di ottenere delle vincite ulteriori utilizzando la funzione Gamble che si attiva con il tasto “Rischio”: in seguito a ogni vincita, di qualsiasi entità, cliccandoci su, appare una mano di carte da gioco e due colori da scegliere, rosso e nero. Quando la carta viene girata, se è del colore sul quale si è scommesso, la vincita verrà raddoppiata, in caso contrario invece si perderà tutto.
Tra le altre possibilità di vincita ricordiamo poi quella offerta nel corso delle partite bonus: se il simbolo Scatter compare una o più volte, si vince anche se questo non si trova in posizioni adiacenti.

Slot simili
Il tema dell’Antico Egitto e, più in generale, quello delle antiche civiltà, rappresenta un grande classico delle slot machine, e sono tante le case madri che lo propongono per i loro giochi.
Una su tutte è senza ombra di dubbio la mitica Book of Ra, una slot che si gioca all’ombra delle piramidi, famosissima e amata da tantissimi giocatori in tutto il mondo!
Una variazione sul tema è Book of Maya, in cui l’ambientazione si sposta nella giungla tra gli antichi tempi Maya, accompagnati dai simboli che richiamano la civiltà azteca.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Ark: A slot game for the adventurous

If you're a seasoned gambler with a taste for adventure, Novomatic's Golden Ark slot game is the perfect choice for you. The game is set in an ancient Egyptian tomb, and you play as an intrepid explorer searching for the pharaoh's treasures.

The 5-reel, 10-payline slot game features accurate depictions of ancient Egyptian symbols, including warriors, the Eye of Horus, and the Book of Ra. The book serves as both a scatter and a wild symbol, unlocking free spins when it appears three or more times.

The graphics are stunning and the gameplay is smooth and enjoyable. Plus, with a minimum bet of just €0.10 and a maximum bet of €100, there are plenty of opportunities for big wins.

But the real thrill of Golden Ark comes from the Gamble feature, which allows you to potentially double your winnings with a simple game of chance. And with the scatter symbol paying out regardless of its position on the reels, there are even more chances to win big.

If you're a fan of ancient civilization-themed slot games like Book of Ra or Book of Maya, Golden Ark is a must-try for its excellent graphics, exciting gameplay, and potential for thrilling wins.

message.content:
Golden Ark: A slot game for the adventurous

If you're a seasoned gambler with a taste for adventure, Novomatic's Golden Ark slot game is the perfect choice for you. The game is set in an ancient Egyptian tomb, and you play as an intrepid explorer searching for the pharaoh's treasures.

The 5-reel, 10-payline slot game features accurate depictions of ancient Egyptian symbols, including warriors, the Eye of Horus, and the Book of Ra. The book serves as both a scatter and a wild symbol, unlocking free spins when it appears three or more times.

The graphics are stunning and the gameplay is smooth and enjoyable. Plus, with a minimum bet of just €0.10 and a maximum bet of €100, there are plenty of opportunities for big wins.

But the real thrill of Golden Ark comes from the Gamble feature, which allows you to potentially double your winnings with a simple game of chance. And with the scatter symbol paying out regardless of its position on the reels, there are even more chances to win big.

If you're a fan of ancient civilization-themed slot games like Book of Ra or Book of Maya, Golden Ark is a must-try for its excellent graphics, exciting gameplay, and potential for thrilling wins.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Ark is a slot game that takes players on a journey into the fascinating world of ancient civilizations. Developed by Novomatic, this game challenges players to explore the crypts beneath a colossal pyramid to uncover the treasures of a pharaoh. With beautiful graphics and authentic Egyptian symbols, the game immerses players in a world of esoteric knowledge and mysterious artifacts.

The game features 5 reels and 10 paylines, with a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum bet of €100. The Autoplay function is also available for those who want to sit back and watch the reels spin.

Symbols in the game include bronze warriors, a book, the eye of Horus and other golden objects, as well as the typical playing card symbols from 9 to Ace. The Scatter symbol is the mythical Book of Ra, with its rich jewel-encrusted cover. When three or more Scatter symbols appear, players can access up to 10 free spins. The Book of Ra also functions as the Wild symbol, substituting for all other symbols on a single payline.

To win in Golden Ark, players need to land winning combinations of symbols in the correct order on a payline, at least twice from left to right. The Scatter symbol pays regardless of its position on the reels. Winning players can also choose to gamble their winnings with the Gamble feature, where they can guess the color of a face-down card to double their winnings or lose everything.

For those who enjoy the theme of ancient civilizations, other similar slot games include the popular Book of Ra and its spin-off Book of Maya, set in the rainforests of ancient Maya civilization. With its beautiful graphics and exciting gameplay, Golden Ark is a must-try for experienced gamblers looking for a new adventure.

To win in Golden Ark, players need to land winning combinations of symbols in the correct order on a payline, at least twice from left to right. The Scatter symbol pays regardless of its position on the reels. Winning players can also choose to gamble their winnings with the Gamble feature, where they can guess the color of a face-down card to double their winnings or lose everything.

For those who enjoy the theme of ancient civilizations, other similar slot games include the popular Book of Ra and its spin-off Book of Maya, set in the rainforests of ancient Maya civilization. With its beautiful graphics and exciting gameplay, Golden Ark is a must-try for experienced gamblers looking for a new adventure.

response.headline: Unleash Your Inner Indiana Jones with Golden Ark Slot Game
response.content:
Do you have an inner adventurer itching to uncover hidden treasures and ancient secrets? Look no further than Golden Ark, the Novomatic slot game that takes you on an epic journey through the annals of history.

The graphics are stunning, transporting you to a time when pharaohs ruled over empires and the gods walked amongst us mere mortals. You'll feel like you're walking through the grand halls of an ancient temple as you spin the reels in search of the Golden Ark itself.

But be warned - this game is not for the faint of heart. The rewards may be great, but danger lurks at every corner. You'll encounter traps and obstacles that will challenge even the most seasoned explorer. Luckily, with enough persistence and a dash of luck, you'll emerge victorious - and with riches beyond your wildest dreams.

And, let's not forget about the game's symbols themselves. Scarabs, pharaohs, sarcophagi - all the staples of ancient Egyptian lore make an appearance here. But keep an eye out for the titular Golden Ark symbol. This elusive symbol will unlock untold riches if you can land it in the right spot on the reels.

So what are you waiting for? Strap on your boots and grab your trusty whip - adventure awaits in Golden Ark. Just don't forget to watch out for the snakes.

Firstly, it's important to understand the rules of the game. To win, you need to land at least two or three identical symbols from left to right on an active payline. Review:
 
Golden Ark Slot Game

Golden Ark is a slot game developed by Novomatic that takes players on an adventure into the world of ancient civilizations. The game features beautiful graphics and authentic symbols that immerse players in a world of esoteric knowledge and mysterious artifacts.

Game Features and Symbols

The game features 5 reels and 10 paylines with a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum bet of €100. Symbols in the game include bronze warriors, a book, the eye of Horus, other golden objects, as well as the typical playing card symbols from 9 to Ace. The Scatter symbol is the mythical Book of Ra with its jewel-encrusted cover. When three or more Scatter symbols appear, players can access up to 10 free spins. The Book of Ra also functions as the Wild symbol, substituting for all other symbols on a single payline.

How to Win in Golden Ark

To win in Golden Ark, players need to land winning combinations of symbols in the correct order on a payline, at least twice from left to right. The Scatter symbol pays regardless of its position on the reels. Winning players can also choose to gamble their winnings with the Gamble feature, where they can guess the color of a face-down card to double their winnings or lose everything.

Similar Slot Games

For those who enjoy the theme of ancient civilizations, other similar slot games include the popular Book of Ra and its spin-off Book of Maya, set in the rainforests of ancient Maya civilization.

Final Thoughts

With its beautiful graphics and exciting gameplay, Golden Ark is a must-try for experienced gamblers looking for a new adventure. The game's theme and symbols capture the essence of ancient civilizations and make for an engaging experience. Whether you're a fan of Egyptian or Mayan culture, Golden Ark and its similar slot games offer hours of entertainment and the chance to win big.
